headline: Berkshire Hathaway’s New Investment Could Be a Game Changer for D.R. Horton (DHI)
summary: Berkshire Hathaway revealed in Q2 2025 that it initiated a new stake in D.R. Horton, aiming to capitalize on the persistent U.S. housing shortage and a more favorable mortgage rate landscape. This move by a prominent investor highlights increased market confidence in D.R. Horton and may influence broader investor sentiment toward the homebuilder sector. We'll explore how Berkshire Hathaway's involvement could reshape D.R.
